title: Create FO-12 discovery and affirmation agents
description:
## Objective

Create the Mastra agent definitions for FO-12: discovery agent (steps 4-5) and affirmation agent (batch size 10).

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md — Sections: "Discovery Agent", "Affirmation Agent"

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- src/mastra/agents/fo-12/index.ts — Re-exports both agents and factory functions
- src/mastra/agents/fo-12/discovery-agent.ts — Based on FO-11, uses 'fo-12' namespace
- src/mastra/agents/fo-12/affirmation-agent.ts — Based on FO-11, DEFAULT_INSTRUCTIONS updated: batch size 10 instead of 5

## Implementation

1. Copy src/mastra/agents/fo-11/ to src/mastra/agents/fo-12/
2. In index.ts: rename all FO11 to FO12
3. In discovery-agent.ts:
   - Rename agent id to 'fo-12-discovery'
   - Change KV lookups from 'fo-11' to 'fo-12'
   - No step 7 — only handles steps 4 and 5
4. In affirmation-agent.ts:
   - Rename agent id to 'fo-12-affirmation'
   - Change KV lookups from 'fo-11' to 'fo-12'
   - Update DEFAULT_INSTRUCTIONS: change "exactly 5 affirmation strings" to "exactly 10 affirmation strings"

## Tests

Verify: npx tsc --noEmit passes

Do NOT close until tests pass.
acceptance_criteria: npx tsc --noEmit passes with no FO-12 agent errors
closed_reason: Created FO-12 discovery and affirmation agents. Files: src/mastra/agents/fo-12/index.ts, discovery-agent.ts (fo-12-discovery, steps 4-5 only, no step 7), affirmation-agent.ts (fo-12-affirmation, batch size 10 in DEFAULT_INSTRUCTIONS). npx tsc --noEmit passes with no FO-12 errors.
